help-file.title: CAMP
help-file.content:
Syntax: camp
When you are adventuring by road, it is often not advantageous to continue your journey through the night, so Duris has a "Camp" option. Locate a safe place to camp for the night and then type "camp". You must then wait a period of time before you can exit the game. If you leave the room in which you are trying to set up camp or if you fight, camping will automatically cancel. Once you fully camp, you will be sent to the main menu, just as when you rent.
Warning: If you go link-dead, camping will stop (linkdead rent does *not* reset your homeroom).
